doc.title: Delusions
doc.plot: Choices. Everyone in life makes them, but they are always the right ones. a choice of a good life, is a delusion. Three lives, each different, aspiring for greatness, succumbs to the choices they make. Each choice seems like the best, but as their lives spiral downward, they realize that their choices are far from the right ones. This is the story of three lives: Parker a small time drug dealer, Ashley a young woman who has yet to experience the darker side of life and Cyrus a debt collector who feels that he can change people. When Parker ends up owing money to Leon, he uses his power of manipulation to enlist the help of innocent Ashley. Cyrus, being Ashley's brother gets involved only to help stop his sister from falling further down into a world of darkness. As the movie unfolds, all three will learn the harsh truths about life, love, guilt and how a simple choice can change out world irretrievably forever.
